review.author: DevOps
findings: M3: 2-layer deduplication — delivery-check primary guard + trigger messageId marker safety net
delivery-check query in hm-send prevents ACK-loss → false fallback to trigger file
Trigger fallback prepends [HM-MESSAGE-ID:...] marker, handleTriggerFile strips + dedupes
Bounded TTL map for recent trigger IDs prevents unbounded growth
Existing hm-send tests updated, new delivery-check test added (6/6 pass)
triggers-full.test.js extended with dedup test coverage
websocket-delivery.test.js extended with delivery-check protocol test

_docs.rule: If change_type !== 'routine', reviewer model MUST differ from author model
_docs.workflow: 1. Author fills author+author_model+change_type. 2. Reviewer fills reviewer+model+result+findings. 3. Pre-commit checks result=approved and cross-model rule. 4. After commit, review.json is reset to pending.
